bot:
Hey there!
 How can I help you
See you later!
The pleasure is all mine!

Admission in this college are done through the IIT-JEE and through the JOSSA admission process.
Go to the website of IIITN https://iiitn.ac.in/ to read the admission procedure

Placements are so good here
Highest package is 40lpa
Average package is 12lpa

Fees of the college changes every year
For academic year 2022-2023 it is around 9lpa for academics and including hostel it is aroud 15lpa
Survey No. 140,141/1 behind Br. Sheshrao Wankhade Shetkari Sahkari Soot Girni, Village - Waranga, PO - Dongargaon(Butibori), Tahsil- Nagpur (Rural), District Nagpur, Maharashtra- 441108
Sorry! IIIT Nagpur does not offer any type of refund for academic as well as hostel fees
To get the syllabus for CSE department, head to https://iiitn.ac.in/Downloads/SYLLABUS-FOR-CSE-2016.pdf
To get the syllabus for ECE department, head to https://iiitn.ac.in/Downloads/academic/ece/scheme/ECE_Scheme_Batch_2016.pdf
Currently two branches are there i.e CSE and ECE
There are different subjects like IT WORKSHOP, OOPS, MICROPROCESSORS etc.
There are different subjects like Electronics, Analog Signal, etc.
There are different scholarships available like NSP, MAHADBT etc. Head to https://iiitn.ac.in/ to get more details
Facilities like 24*7 WIFI, smart class rooms etc are available in the campus
Each faculty gives assignments to the students like projects, problems,etc. throughout the semester.
You have to make the mini project in JAVA. Go to https://github.com/Ayush-singla27/OOPS-mini-project for more reference
You have to make the mini project using 8085 microprocessor. Go to https://www.tutorialspoint.com/8085-program-to-simulate-a-real-time-clock for more reference

Faculty is very good with most of them have so much experience of teaching and are qualified from top colleges of India
 Some faculties are:-
1.Dr.Tausif Diwan(HOD CSE)
2.Dr.Mayur Parate(HOD ECE)
3.Dr.Shishupal Kumar
4.Dr. Charu Goel
5.Dr.Shankar
6.Dr.Rahul Semwal
OOPS is basically object oriented programming and it is teach by Puja Gudadhe
microprocessor and interfacing is teach by Shankar Bhattacharya. In this we basically learnt about the 8085 microprocessor
maths is teach by Dr. Charu Goel. In this we learnt about Numerical Methods and many conceps related to probability
Data Structures with Applications is teach by Rahul Semwal. In this we basically learnt about the different data structures and alogorithms
Computer System Organisation is teach by Mayuri Digalwar. In this we basically learnt about the architecture of the computer
HOD of CSE Department is Dr.Tausif Diwan. To get know about other staff of CSE BRANCH head to https://iiitn.ac.in/page/faculty/192/
HOD of ECE Department is Dr.Mayur Parate. To get know about other staff of ECE BRANCH head to https://iiitn.ac.in/page/faculty/204/
I'm great! Thanks for asking.
